about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Homesfy Realty Limited is Proptech engaged in providing real estate broking services to Real Estate Developers, retail buyers/sellers and investors for residential properties.

The company runs its brokerage business in the name of Homesfy and is well-partnered with the mymagnet.io co-broking platform.

Homesfy Realty Limited has established and currently maintains a network of 7 offices located in 4 cities, Mumbai, Pune, Noida and Bangalore, which primarily engage in sales, marketing and payment collection activities for the business.

Homesfy brokerage business is a combination of both offline and online presence and provides real estate broking-related services through the website http://www.homesfy.in/, prospect calling, and digital advertisement platform.

The company operating model is backed by strong expertise in Digital Marketing and Operational efficiency backed by process-driven expertise, technology and automation. As of October 2022, 245 out of 380 employees were in the sales department.

Strengths:

  • The company have highly experienced and stable management
  • The company have long-standing relationships with the largest Developers in India
  • Efficient Transaction Process
  • Service Quality
  • The company have a well-qualified and highly motivated workforce
  • The company have established a wide network of offices to support and augment our sales and client management
  • The company have the technological expertise for the improvement and development of a product portfolio
  • Growth through a combination of acquisitions and organic growth
  • Visit for an extensive set of information about the company: https://www.homesfy.in/investor_corner

faqs.question: What is the Homesfy Realty IPO?
faqs.answer:
Homesfy Realty IPO is a SME IPO of 805200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.86 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹197 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on December 21, 2022, and closes on December 23, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Homesfy Realty IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Homesfy Realty IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Homesfy Realty IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Homesfy Realty IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Homesfy Realty IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Homesfy Realty IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Homesfy Realty IPO opens on December 21, 2022 and closes on December 23, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Homesfy Realty IPO?
faqs.answer: Homesfy Realty IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,18,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Homesfy Realty IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Homesfy Realty IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Homesfy Realty IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Homesfy Realty IPO will be done on Wednesday, December 28, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, December 30, 2022. Check the Homesfy Realty IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Homesfy Realty IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Homesfy Realty IPO listing date is on Monday, January 2, 2023.
